title: Just Listed- Well Maintained Single Story

Amy Lam

show contact info
Well-maintained traditional-style single story home with large front and back yards on quiet residential cul-de-sac.
Gorgeous wooden floor in living room, hallway and bedrooms.
Updated 3/4 bathroom.
Ceiling fans in all bedrooms with central air conditioning and heat.
Ample closet space in each bedroom.
Kitchen has dishwasher and laminate wood flooring.
Enjoy your meals in the kitchen in the breakfast nook or in the separated dining area alongside the living room.
Walk out from the living room to the covered patio and the flat, spacious fenced backyard.
Separate laundry room with built-in cabinetry for storage.
2 car garage and additional driveway parking.
View the foothills from your front yard!
Top-ranked public schools.
Walk to La Fetra Elementary School, Sandburg Middle School and Citrus College.
Close to Foothill Presbyterian Hospital, neighborhood shops and 210 freeway.
Agents, please read Agent Remarks before showing/submitting applications.
